snippet.title: Aliens Colonial Marines Reconnaissance Content Overview - Off The Grid
snippet.description:
A quick overview of the new Survivor map, Off The Grid. A really nice map that I'm sure you'll like the look of, if you enjoy this video make sure to like and subscribe for more. Comment below or on the forums if you'd like to see me do more.

Aliens Colonial Marines; http://www.sega.co.uk/Aliens_Colonial_Marines.aspx

Forum post; http://forums.gearboxsoftware.com/forumdisplay.php?f=70
